00022 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_SYNCH_H
00023 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_SYNCH_H
00024 
00025 #include <nucleus/queue.h>
00026 
00027 /* Creation flags */
00028 #define XNSYNCH_FIFO    0x0
00029 #define XNSYNCH_PRIO    0x1
00030 #define XNSYNCH_NOPIP   0x0
00031 #define XNSYNCH_PIP     0x2
00032 #define XNSYNCH_DREORD  0x4
00033 #define XNSYNCH_OWNER   0x8
00034 
00035 #ifndef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_SYNCH_RELAX
00036 #define CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_SYNCH_RELAX 0
00037 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_SYNCH_RELAX */
00038 
00039 #define XNSYNCH_FLCLAIM XN_HANDLE_SPARE3 /* Corresponding bit in fast lock */
00040 
00041 /* Fast lock API */
00042 static inline int xnsynch_fast_owner_check(xnarch_atomic_t *fastlock,
00043                                            xnhandle_t ownerh)
00044 {
00045         return (xnhandle_mask_spare(xnarch_atomic_get(fastlock)) == ownerh) ?
00046                 0 : -EPERM;
00047 }
00048 
00049 static inline int xnsynch_fast_acquire(xnarch_atomic_t *fastlock,
00050                                        xnhandle_t new_ownerh)
00051 {
00052         xnhandle_t lock_state =
00053                 xnarch_atomic_cmpxchg(fastlock, XN_NO_HANDLE, new_ownerh);
00054 
00055         if (likely(lock_state == XN_NO_HANDLE))
00056                 return 0;
00057 
00058         if (xnhandle_mask_spare(lock_state) == new_ownerh)
00059                 return -EBUSY;
00060 
00061         return -EAGAIN;
00062 }
00063 
00064 static inline int xnsynch_fast_release(xnarch_atomic_t *fastlock,
00065                                        xnhandle_t cur_ownerh)
00066 {
00067         return (xnarch_atomic_cmpxchg(fastlock, cur_ownerh, XN_NO_HANDLE) ==
00068                 cur_ownerh);
00069 }
00070 
00071 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00072 
00073 #define XNSYNCH_CLAIMED 0x10    /* Claimed by other thread(s) w/ PIP */
00074 
00075 #define XNSYNCH_FLCLAIM XN_HANDLE_SPARE3 /* Corresponding bit in fast lock */
00076 
00077 /* Spare flags usable by upper interfaces */
00078 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE0  0x01000000
00079 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE1  0x02000000
00080 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE2  0x04000000
00081 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE3  0x08000000
00082 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE4  0x10000000
00083 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE5  0x20000000
00084 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE6  0x40000000
00085 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE7  0x80000000
00086 
00087 /* Statuses */
00088 #define XNSYNCH_DONE    0       /* Resource available / operation complete */
00089 #define XNSYNCH_WAIT    1       /* Calling thread blocked -- start rescheduling */
00090 #define XNSYNCH_RESCHED 2       /* Force rescheduling */
00091 
00092 struct xnthread;
00093 struct xnsynch;
00094 struct xnmutex;
00095 
00096 typedef struct xnsynch {
00097 
00098     xnpholder_t link;   /* Link in claim queues */
00099 
00100 #define link2synch(ln)          container_of(ln, struct xnsynch, link)
00101 
00102     xnflags_t status;   /* Status word */
00103 
00104     xnpqueue_t pendq;   /* Pending threads */
00105 
00106     struct xnthread *owner; /* Thread which owns the resource */
00107 
00108     xnarch_atomic_t *fastlock; /* Pointer to fast lock word */
00109 
00110     void (*cleanup)(struct xnsynch *synch); /* Cleanup handler */
00111 
00112 } xnsynch_t;
00113 
00114 #define xnsynch_test_flags(synch,flags) testbits((synch)->status,flags)
00115 #define xnsynch_set_flags(synch,flags)  setbits((synch)->status,flags)
00116 #define xnsynch_clear_flags(synch,flags)        clrbits((synch)->status,flags)
00117 #define xnsynch_wait_queue(synch)               (&((synch)->pendq))
00118 #define xnsynch_nsleepers(synch)                countpq(&((synch)->pendq))
00119 #define xnsynch_pended_p(synch)         (!emptypq_p(&((synch)->pendq)))
00120 #define xnsynch_owner(synch)            ((synch)->owner)
00121 
00122 #define xnsynch_fastlock(synch)         ((synch)->fastlock)
00123 #define xnsynch_fastlock_p(synch)       ((synch)->fastlock != NULL)
00124 #define xnsynch_owner_check(synch, thread) \
00125         xnsynch_fast_owner_check((synch)->fastlock, xnthread_handle(thread))
00126 
00127 #define xnsynch_fast_is_claimed(fastlock) \
00128         xnhandle_test_spare(fastlock, XNSYNCH_FLCLAIM)
00129 #define xnsynch_fast_set_claimed(fastlock, enable) \
00130         (((fastlock) & ~XNSYNCH_FLCLAIM) | ((enable) ? XNSYNCH_FLCLAIM : 0))
00131 #define xnsynch_fast_mask_claimed(fastlock) ((fastlock & ~XNSYNCH_FLCLAIM))
00132 
00133 #ifdef __cplusplus
00134 extern "C" {
00135 #endif
00136 
00137 void __xnsynch_fixup_rescnt(struct xnthread *thread);
00138 
00139 struct xnthread *__xnsynch_transfer_ownership(struct xnsynch *synch,
00140                                               struct xnthread *lastowner);
00141 #if XENO_DEBUG(SYNCH_RELAX)

00144                                   struct xnthread *sleeper);

00146 void xnsynch_detect_claimed_relax(struct xnthread *owner);
00147 
00148 #else /* !XENO_DEBUG(SYNCH_RELAX) */
00149 
00150 static inline void xnsynch_detect_relaxed_owner(struct xnsynch *synch,
00151                                   struct xnthread *sleeper)
00152 {
00153 }
00154 
00155 static inline void xnsynch_detect_claimed_relax(struct xnthread *owner)
00156 {
00157 }
00158 
00159 #endif /* !XENO_DEBUG(SYNCH_RELAX) */
00160 
00161 void xnsynch_init(struct xnsynch *synch, xnflags_t flags,
00162                   xnarch_atomic_t *fastlock);
00163 
00164 #define xnsynch_destroy(synch)  xnsynch_flush(synch, XNRMID)
00165 
00166 static inline void xnsynch_set_owner(struct xnsynch *synch,
00167                                      struct xnthread *thread)
00168 {
00169         synch->owner = thread;
00170 }
00171 
00172 static inline void xnsynch_register_cleanup(struct xnsynch *synch,
00173                                             void (*handler)(struct xnsynch *))
00174 {
00175         synch->cleanup = handler;
00176 }
00177 
00178 xnflags_t xnsynch_sleep_on(struct xnsynch *synch,
00179                            xnticks_t timeout,
00180                            xntmode_t timeout_mode);
00181 
00182 struct xnthread *xnsynch_wakeup_one_sleeper(struct xnsynch *synch);
00183 
00184 int xnsynch_wakeup_many_sleepers(struct xnsynch *synch, int nr);
00185 
00186 xnpholder_t *xnsynch_wakeup_this_sleeper(struct xnsynch *synch,
00187                                          xnpholder_t *holder);
00188 
00189 xnflags_t xnsynch_acquire(struct xnsynch *synch,
00190                           xnticks_t timeout,
00191                           xntmode_t timeout_mode);
00192 
00193 struct xnthread *xnsynch_peek_pendq(struct xnsynch *synch);
00194 
00195 int xnsynch_flush(struct xnsynch *synch, xnflags_t reason);
00196 
00197 void xnsynch_release_all_ownerships(struct xnthread *thread);
00198 
00199 void xnsynch_requeue_sleeper(struct xnthread *thread);
00200 
00201 void xnsynch_forget_sleeper(struct xnthread *thread);
00202 
00203 #ifdef __cplusplus
00204 }
00205 #endif
00206 
00207 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */

00209 #endif /* !_XENO_NUCLEUS_SYNCH_H_ */
